title: Liz Wig Long Wavy Cosplay Wig 26'' (Dark Brown w/Blonde Highlights)
features: Cap Size: Average cap fits all
Material: 100% Heat Friendly Resistant Heat Friendly Synthetic Fiber
description: 100% Heat Friendly Resistant Heat Friendly Synthetic Fiber

This wig by Lizmall is a wavy wig style made of 100% Japanese synthetic hair. Featuring a full bang, you can either wear it off to the side or have it trimmed to wear it forward. Layered big wave start from neck ensures a pretty hair shape. Bleached blonde highlight makes it a perfect party wig. You may also have your hairdresser to style as you wish according to your face shape. Made with a traditional cap construction will ensure the volume and style to last all day long.
